text:
Hi everyone,

I’m excited to share that we’ve just released a new app called “PDF CreateMate” - The Ultimate Tool for Personalised PDF Generation on the HubSpot Marketplace!

Some of the key features of PDF CreateMate include:
• Creating template using HubSpot contact properties
• Generate personalised PDFs (triggered by workflow)
• Seamlessly sync personalized PDFs with HubSpot
• Sending PDF zip directly over email
Our app integrates seamlessly with your HubSpot account. You can use your existing templates to create personalized PDFs in no time.

If you’re interested in trying out PDF CreateMate, you can find it on the HubSpot Marketplace or visit <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/468777/marketplace/apps/sales/crm/pdf-createmate-1172141|this link>. We’d love to hear your feedback and suggestions for how we can improve the app to meet your needs.

Thanks for your support, and we hope you find PDF CreateMate useful for your business!

Cheers, Raviraj

Just wanted to drop this <https://www.linkedin.com/posts/justindgivens_HubSpot-eventmanagement-activity-7054116700186701824-jbYd?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop|here>. If you run events and always wished you could utilize HubSpot’s marketing events.
